thread.title: First trailer released for Scorsese, Jagger '70s rock series
thread.title_full: First trailer released for Scorsese, Jagger '70s rock series | www.daytondailynews.com

author: Terje Bendiksby
title: First trailer released for Scorsese, Jagger '70s rock series
text:
Missed much of the '70s? A new HBO series by some big names in entertainment may help fill in the blanks.
HBO has released its first full-length trailer for "Vinyl," a series executive produced by Oscar-award winning director Martin Scorsese and rock legend Mick Jagger, NME reported.
>> Read more trending stories
Bobby Cannavale stars as Richie, a record executive trying to relaunch his company in New York.
The show's cast includes Andrew Dice Clay, Ray Romano, Olivia Wilde and Jagger's son, James, who portrays the singer of a fictional punk band.
The pilot will premiere on HBO in January.
You can watch the trailer here , warning of adult language and themes.
